Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Incorrectly \In`cor*rect"ly\, adv. Not correctly; inaccurately; not exactly; as, a writing incorrectly copied; testimony incorrectly stated. [1913 Webster]

incorrectly adv 1: in an incorrect manner; "to credit Lister with the first formulation of the basic principle of stratigraphy would be to bestow credit falsely" [syn: {falsely}] 2: in an incorrect manner; "she guessed wrong" [syn: {wrongly}, {wrong}] [ant: {correctly}, {correctly}]
